extendedInfo.description: --:: Live Wallpaper ::--Colored Comets and lines flying across the screen.Double click -> more cometsThe full version has a similar blue iconTo use this app, go to the homescreen -> menu -> background -> live wallpaperTags: anipet flurry sense nexus thunderstorm doodle pixel zombie live wallpaper livewallpaper

reviews.comment: Worked great on my Android ((Huawei)). I really like it! Entertaining and fun. I\'m definitely keeping it. <3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Comet shapes in demo are quite dull and boring. Not enuf motivation to buy pay version. Like the grey industrial background though. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would love to get the paid version but cannot find anywhere. One of my fave live wallpapers and ready to buy. 5 stars when available.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best free live wallpaper! Runs smooth on my droid x
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I really like this wallpaper. It works perfectly for me. Thanks :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its nice, but it\'s a demo - I wouldn\'t have wasted my time downloading if I knew that.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome, elegant, low battery usage live wallpaper. Would give five stars but the full version says it doesn\'t support froyo. Get that to work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Better than expected! Nice look
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: LOVE IT! App 2 SD for 5 stars!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pretty cool wallpaper, would be better if you had more options in the free version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very cool, I like it a lot! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on HTC 2.1 & for all you morons who say it won\'t open, TRY READING THE INSTRUCTIONS ABOVE!

reviews.comment: Wahhh!! It is force closing alot! Which is really sad b cuz this wuz my fav wallpaper! FIX PLZ! =(

reviews.comment: Not bad. ALL YOU TARDS THAT WHINE THAT YOU CAN NOT OPEN IT HAVE NO BUSINESS OWNING A SMART PHONE IF YOU CAN NOT CHANGE THE WALLPAPER.

reviews.comment: Only trial but cool.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: [sigh] It\'s a Live Wallpaper geniuses. It\'s only accessable where you access ask your other Live Wallpapers. You don\'t open it as an application.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Looks really nice. Surprisingly it works on mytouch with 5.0.7. But because it lacks customization, its very slow. (I want to set it to less comets)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome background! Wish the demo had settings available though. :-/ moto droid

reviews.comment: Much better than rating led to believe! Moto droid 2.1

reviews.comment: Looks nice, I\'m to cheap to pay though. Evo.
